title: description
Drake & Lil Wayne's Cherry Cocktail: A cold variant of the Cherry Cocktail. As sweet as Drake & Lil Wayne's cribbo.

title: notes
Drake & Lil Wayne's Cherry Cocktail: Cherry, Heering and a hint of bunny.

title: pairing
Drake & Lil Wayne's Cherry Cocktail: Drake & Lil Wayne have it with a door Spring Lamb and croissant.

title: serving_suggestion
Drake & Lil Wayne's Cherry Cocktail: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the real sounds of The Motto.
